_sText:
A map i started working on about 4-5 days ago, basically made the entire thing then did some play testing with a couple friends before i added triggers/playerclips to see what they thought, they liked the game play so i added some triggers, clips and improvements based on feedback. As well as some small detailing, was mostly square shaped rooms to begin with. 

Then Nairda was nice enough to let me playtest the map on the Ultima WL server, so a huge thanks to him and everyone who play tested it with me and gave feedback.

I aimed for this map to be a bit longer than the maps i usually make, kind of like rgbglow but rgbglow had a lot of annoying parts which made running it kinda meh, this map however features quite a lot of boosters and possible 'spins' so if youre not a big fan of those it might not be your favorite to run at max speed (only rly an issue if ure going for the most optimal run, but i have tweaked the parts multiple times to make it easier and not as frustrating)

If its too much please let me know for my next map so i know what to change, im always looking to improve at map making (funny how i say this yet i keep making glow maps xd, maybe one day ill make something more creative)
